Detailed Description

Base class for SimVectorConstant descendants.

Author:
Lee Netherton
This is an abstract class which provides a base for read only SimVector's like SimInputVector. The main functionality that it provides is the ability to obtain its own data pointer from the simulation structure. This is provided via getSimIoPointer(). To aid the retreval of this pointer, the class is equiped with a pointer to the InterfaceContainer class (m_interfaceContainer) and the id number of the Interface (m_interfaceId).
